body.name: eos Shea Better Body Lotion- Vanilla Cashmere, 24-Hour Moisture Skin Care, Lightweight & Non-Greasy, Made with Natural Shea, Vegan, 16 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 25 mins
features: SHEA BETTER BODY LOTION: Our sweet and nuzzly Vanilla Cashmere scent contains fragrance notes of whipped vanilla, soft musk and cozy caramel. eos 24-hour hydration body lotion is made with natural ingredients to leave your skin smooth from head-to-toe.
24-HOUR MOISTURE FOR YOUR BODY: Soothe and protect your skin with our lightweight and non-greasy lotion. No sticky residue or heaviness, just all-day hydration and smooth skin.
SMOOTH ON: Apply this fast-absorbing and deliciously scented body lotion to just-cleaned skin, paying special attention to dry, rough areas. Relax – we’ll do the rest.

SUSTAINABLE SKIN CARE: Protect and moisturize your skin with 7 nourishing oils + butters, including natural shea butter and shea oil. Our collection of incredible fragrances will delight in application and last all day on skin

ALL-NATURAL SHEA BUTTER: eos products have wild grown, sustainably-sourced 100% natural shea butter to make skin feel moisturized, protected and soft. We are paraben, phthalate and gluten free. Dermatologist tested. Vegan. Hypoallergenic. PETA certified. No products tested on animals.
body.description: Our sweet and nuzzly Vanilla Cashmere body lotion captures the warmth of whipped vanilla, the softness of musk and the coziness of the caramel for a rich, luxurious fragrance with a sensual twist. eos 24H body lotion with instantly moisturizing Shea Oil + lasting protection Shea Butter quickly absorbs for 24-hour hydration. Say hello to… fast-absorption, lightweight, soft skin, and sustainable shea. Say goodbye to… greasiness, heaviness, and sticky residue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EOS Vanilla Cashmere lotion
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: Okay so this will probably just be a hand lotion when I’m out of my regular lotion, from now on. The scent doesn’t last on me (that’s fine - most scents don’t hang around for too long). The problem is - it turns into a lactonic skin scent - *on me*. I shower before bed and I put this on my arms, neck and hands - and go to sleep. Each time, I wake up smelling like milk. I’ve never experienced this before. Not spoiled milk - just - milk. Not the warm and inviting scent I’m going for. Also - due to circumstances - I don’t sleep very long. So this turns, in 3-4 hours. Bummer because I really liked it. I still have my vanilla bean Noel lotion from B&BW and it scratches the same itch but this lotion feels so much better/more moisturizing so I’m bummed. My search for a decent vanilla lotion continues.Smells identical to B&BW VBN - if you know, you know. So while the fragrance is spot on the same - it’s less cloying than VBN (which hits far too heavy on the caramel note - the caramel overshadows everything). But this EOS lotion? Perfection! It’s not cloying. It’s perfectly sweet and rich but not overly so, in either direction. I put this on after my bed time shower and it’s a nice soothing scent.As for the lotion consistency - it’s phenomenal! It’s thick but satin-y. It’s not greasy at all. The thickness means you need to rub it in a bit more but once it’s dry - you’re moisturized and you’re also dry - no weird residue! My skin loves it. I have super thirty skin that steals moisture and fragrance from all my products. This still feels really nice, 4 hours after applying. I highly recommend it! Due to the fragrance, tho - I’d either wear this alone or pair with a similar scent profile in other frags (vanilla, cashmere). For what it’s worth - I own BBW VBN lotion. This smells better and outperforms it (moisturizing) a hundred times over. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I recently tried the EOS lotion, and overall, I'm quite impressed with its performance.
reviews.reviewText: The lotion itself has a light and non-greasy texture, making it easy to apply and quick to absorb into the skin. It left my skin feeling soft and moisturized, which is a definite plus. This is the most long-lasting option, its hydrating effects and convenient packaging make it a reliable choice for on-the-go moisturizing. Overall, EOS lotion is a solid choice for those who prefer a lightweight, travel-friendly option with a pleasant scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a lovely lotion, if you like a tropical smell, that goes on, but doesn’t overwhelm. The warm scent may, to a few, seem strong, but mellows quickly. This lotion is moisturizing and not greasy. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I actually like this lotion. It is my first time using it, so my skin has been reacting very well with it. Its nice and thick. I hate light lotions during the winter time so I was worried I wouldn't be thick to my liking but I was wrong. Its a nice size bottle and it feels so smooth on the skin after applying. It has no smell what so ever and it does not smell weird at all considering it has no smell. I don't know about you guys but sometimes lotion can smell weird when it's not scented in my opinion. I would definitely recommend for adults and kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good, long lasting, makes skin v smooth
reviews.reviewText: It kinda smells like iceing. I love it. Goes on a little strong but after a few mins it calms down. The smell is very gender neutral. It would be paired well with sweet feminine vanilla/ coconut. But for us it would also be paired very well with a coconut musk, or just a smell with more musk notes. def makes me smell edible, I would say its worth the hype. Mainly because yeah it smells pretty damn good, but also it makes my skin feel like butter. I use lotion often but this lotion is so thick and creamy, and they shea butter really hydrates the skin. I pair this with fresh cream warm cashmir by philosophy, I use the body wash and the perfume and I use Oat milk latte deodorant by native and I smell amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan of the scent
reviews.reviewText: I have used EOS Pomegranate Raspberry and although I felt the scent was quite strong, at least it was a pleasant scent. This Vanilla Cashmere smells like some sort of vanilla cheesecake - but not in a good way. Aside from the scent, I do like the lotion. It's very thick and rich, goes on nicely. It absorbs well and doesn't leave a greasy feel on your skin. It seems to moisturize fairly well and leaves my skin feeling hydrated and supple. I don't think I'll buy this scent again, but I do like this brand of lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The TikTok girlies made me buy it, and it did not disappoint. It’s rich and smooth keeps my skin moisturized for the entire day. Let’s talk about the smell, the vanilla cashmere is so nice, it’s not as strong as i thought but it’s definitely a pleasant sweet vanilla and soft musk almost smells edible. My only complaint is the pump, I think the spout is way too short, so I find that I have to angle it a particular way to make sure the product goes in my hand and not on the side of the bottle. Otherwise, excellent product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews.reviewText: This Fragrance-Free EOS Shea Better Body Lotion is a total winner! 🏆 No overpowering scents, just pure hydration goodness. The shea butter does wonders, and the pump is a game-changer for easy use. My skin feels mega-smooth without the greasy aftermath. Definitely a daily go-to now. Five stars for keeping it simple and effective! 👍🌟

Shea Better 24H Moisture Body Lotion in Vanilla Cashmere is a luxurious and indulgent skincare essential. This body lotion offers an exceptional blend of shea butter and nourishing ingredients, providing intense hydration that lasts for 24 hours. The enchanting scent of Vanilla Cashmere adds a touch of sophistication, leaving your skin delicately fragranced and feeling irresistibly smooth.The rich, non-greasy formula absorbs quickly, making it ideal for daily use. Whether applied after a shower or throughout the day, the lotion replenishes and revitalizes the skin, leaving it soft, supple, and beautifully moisturized.The Vanilla Cashmere fragrance is a delightful fusion of warm vanilla tones and the velvety softness of cashmere. It lingers gently on the skin, creating a comforting and pampering experience. Packaged in a convenient pump bottle, this body lotion is not only a treat for your skin but also a stylish addition to your skincare routine. Transform your daily moisturizing ritual into a sensory delight with Shea Better 24H Moisture Body Lotion in Vanilla Cashmere.

I love this product! The scent lasts well too, I combine it with the dove shea butter and vanilla soap and my classmate told me I smelled good! I didn't even need to wear perfume ! It is also moisturizing! The only thing I can comment about is that it doesn't last long for the price you pay
it’s a good base for perfumes

reviews.reviewTitle: Tropical Bliss for Your Skin: A Review of Shea Better 24H Moisture Body Lotion in Coconut Waters
reviews.reviewText: Indulging in the Shea Better 24H Moisture Body Lotion in Coconut Waters has been a refreshing and delightful experience, transforming my daily skincare routine into a tropical escape. This body lotion seamlessly combines the hydrating power of shea butter with the invigorating essence of coconut, leaving my skin pampered and nourished throughout the day.The coconut-infused fragrance is an instant mood lifter, evoking images of serene beaches and tropical getaways. The scent is subtle yet lingers delicately on the skin, providing a hint of summer throughout the day. It's a perfect choice for those who appreciate a light and tropical fragrance that isn't overpowering.The 24-hour moisture claim holds true, as this body lotion is incredibly hydrating without being heavy or greasy. The shea butter formula absorbs quickly into the skin, leaving it feeling velvety smooth and thoroughly moisturized.

reviews.reviewerName: They worked out for a few weeks but now they are always found around my house. They stretch out and come off easily. Would buy again.
reviews.reviewText: The small is everything! Like a birthday cake! Beautiful vanilla scent! Makes my skin very soft as well! Love it!
